input.command: cd .claude && for file in ../docs/workflows/research-workflow.md ../docs/workflows/planning-workflow.md ../docs/workflows/compound-request-handling.md ../docs/workflows/semantic-search-hierarchy.md ../docs/configuration/configuration-guide.md ../docs/guides/token-savings-guide.md; do [ -f "$file" ] && echo "✓ $file exists" || echo "✗ $file MISSING"; done
